name: Tap Space Shooter
description:
Pew Pew!

Aliens & Bombs are falling, make your way through tell the end (there is no end)

It's still in it's simplest forms, but it is playable ^^

Consider giving it a go, for Windows/Android (It is targeted mainly to be a mobile game)

What to expect in the future ?

Too much!  sounds and effects! Customization with the points you earn, Points that you'll earn xD more power ups! real Levels! And much more enemies that can shoot back & Final Bosses >:3

Any suggestion is highly appreciated ♥
